'''3.18.4''' is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher]] released on August 7, 2025.{{verify}}

== Changes ==
{{expand section}}
* Changed the loading screen of the launcher to have a animation video of the [[Chase the Skies]] update, similar to [[Launcher 3.16.7]].
